action.action-desc: Ms. Hageman (for herself and Mr. Tiffany) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to pay reparations issued by international bodies or courts for violations of international law.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds to pay reparations issued by international bodies or courts for violations of international law
section.text: No Federal funds may be used to pay any reparations in the form of restitution, compensation and satisfaction issued by an international body or court for a violation of international law unless Congress specifically approves such reparations in an Act of Congress enacted on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
